pages.text:
About
About
At Smokey Bones, we specialize in three things: good food, good drinks, and good times. We are a bar and fire grill, but not necessarily in that order. We are grill masters who respect the power of the open flame. We like simple, yet flavorful recipes and believe marinating is not to be taken lightly. We know medium-rare isn’t the only way to cook a steak, but believe it should be. We believe pork should be slow smoked and pulled often. Slow, as in 11 hours over hickory logs every night, and often, as in every day at every restaurant. We know it’s our bartenders who make our drinks great, not the liquor. Although the liquor doesn’t hurt. We think beer should be ice cold and consumed regularly. We know our servers bring much more than food to the table. We are big fans of sports, loud music, and surprises. And we believe in laughing often, especially at ourselves.
View Menu
View Press
Contact Us

Where Carnivores
Come to Party
The Meat Masters are ready to party when you are.
Private Events
At Smokey Bones
Craving a good time? Our smokehouse is the perfect place for your next birthday, graduation, wedding, reunion, any kind of party, really.
Please contact your local Smokey Bones to book a private event.
Locate My Smokey Bones
What You
Can Expect
Welcoming Atmosphere
At Smokey Bones, we make sure every carnivore gets a warm welcome.
Great Service
Our team prioritizes fast and friendly service, always putting your needs first.
Customizable Menu
When it comes to meat, we’ve got it all. We’ll work with you to satisfy your every craving.
Quality Ingredients
When you’re sitting at our table, you can trust that only the best ingredients make the cut.
VIP Treatment
Enjoy a private, secluded location away from the crowd.
Exclusive Options
Taste unforgettable flavors you can’t get anywhere else.
Carving Station
Enjoy freshly smoked cuts carved just for your table.
Private Bourbon & Whiskey Tasting
Treat your group to a selection of 40+ bourbons and whiskeys.
Cooked. Carved.
Catered.
Cater Smokey Bones for your next event.
Learn More

Frequently Asked Questions
For Bones Club questions, please visit
here
Menu Information
Menu items and pricing
Kindly note, not all menu items are available at every Smokey Bones location and pricing may differ on a location by location basis. You can visit our
online ordering
to see pricing per location.
Limited Time Offers
Smokey Bones is dedicated to providing our guests new and flavorful items to our menu. Items can be offered for a limited time and available to our Bones Club members at an earlier date. Be one of the first to taste these new items by joining our
Bones Club
today.
Nutritional and Allergy Information
Do you have nutritional or allergen information?
Yes!
Nutritional Information
|
Allergy Information
.
Restaurant Locator
How can I find a Smokey Bones near me?
Visit
our locations
page to find a location near you.
Group Reservations
Do you take reservations?
Yes, please call your Smokey Bones of choice to make your reservation.
Are there any restrictions on the number of guests to a reservation?
Restrictions are based on availability at your store of choice.
Can I reserve a section of the restaurant for a large party?
Yes, we offer private parties in store. You can find more information
here
and submit a form to reach out to your local catering contact.
Accounting
How can I receive a copy of my receipt?
Please call your local store to receive a copy of your receipt.
Gift Cards
Where can I purchase a gift card?
Gift cards can be purchased at every store or on our website
gift card page
. When purchasing on our website, the gift card can be mailed to a physical location and can be sent via email as a virtual card.
How can I find out how much is on my gift card?
You can see the amount on your card
here
. Please have your gift card number and email address handy.
Can I track my gift card?
You can track your physical gift card
here
.
Will my gift card ever expire?
Smokey Bones gift cards never expire or lose value.
Email Club
How can I join and what do I get?
Complete the form
here
and we will send you special offers, event information and notifications when we launch new menu items. Stay in touch and you’ll always be first to know!
Can I unsubscribe?
We would hate to see you go but you can always unsubscribe when you receive an email by clicking ‘unsubscribe’ at the bottom of the email.
Lost and Found
Please call your local Smokey Bones for help finding an item left at any store. You can find location information
here
.
Employment
Looking to join the Smokey Bones team? Take a look at our open positions and apply online
here
.
